items.text: full on off, and worked off the back foot to backward square leg
items.shortText: Aponso to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off stump, and tapped away to cover point. Calls for a quick single, and they complete it with ease
items.shortText: Aponso to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump, and he clips it fine to short fine leg for one. The umpire, though, gives it as legbyes
items.shortText: Aponso to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: slower ball and full on leg stump. But it goes past the stumps and the keeper must dive to his left. Manages to glove it towards square leg, and that allows the batsmen to pinch a single as well
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 wides

items.text: full on leg stump, and he misses the whip away to square leg. Hits his front leg and dribbles away to midwicket
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 leg bye

items.preText: Asim: "How's the crowd? Are we building up to the indo-pak contest this wednesday?" 80-20 to the Bangladeshis. Lots of green flags, but a few Sri Lanka flags around as well
items.text: good length on off, and he tries to nudge this to the leg side. But the ball takes an inside edge and ricochets onto his pads. They steal a single as Dhananjaya's throw breaks the stumps at the striker's end, but the rebound off the stumps allows Bangladesh to come back for a second run
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: flat-batted past the bowler off a short ball, but Mathews - at mid off - slides across the ground to stop the ball from breaching the circle
items.postText: Tanvir: "Miraz used to be a batting allrounder in his U-19 days. I think he needs to put more work on his batting and become a true allrounder for Bangladesh."
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: reflex catch from Lakmal! Slower ball on off, and Mehidy tries to execute the straight drive. Comes off the side of the bat, and Lakmal - on his followthrough - bends his knees and takes a very difficult catch to his left. The ball almost popped out of his fingertips there, but he managed to recover and complete the dismissal
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, OUT

dismissal.text: Mehidy Hasan Miraz c & b Lakmal 15 (21b 0x4 0x6) SR: 71.42

items.text: short on middle, and Mashrafe ducks under his first delivery with ease
items.postText: Talha Hameed: "Stats - Mushfiqur Rahim [82*] is his highest ever ODI score v Sri lanka, previous best was 79 at Dhaka in 2014."
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and angling into Mashrafe. Defended off the back foot
items.postText: Ronald: "Thanks Tanvir. Let's talk abt mushis u19 days "
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: tossed up wide outside off, and he slaps a drive through the infield. Man in the deep though
items.shortText: Aponso to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and he pushes this down the ground to wide long off. They jog across for one
items.shortText: Aponso to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and defended off the front foot
items.shortText: Aponso to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: half-tracker on middle, and so Mushfiqur backs away to make some room. Tries to cut it past point, but mistimes the shot to the deep
items.shortText: Aponso to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full on off, and defended off the front foot
items.shortText: Aponso to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: full and wide, and Mashrafe's attempted drive is mistimed to cover. Off the bat's top half
items.shortText: Aponso to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: full on off, and played with soft hands to mid on. He calls early for the single
items.postText: Divy: "One thing that Lanka did well was make lakmal their back-up captain. (Don't know if he does that role for his state/regional side) It has made him the bowling captain sort of akin to the role zaheer played for india in the last decade. And then there is malinga, let's hope these two can be the sachin-dravid of Lankan bowling."
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: good length on off, and he defends with the bat's open face to cover point
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and Mashrafe takes a big stride forward to defend
items.postText: Bilal Malik: "Bangladesh need to realize that this is UAE where you don't need 300 figure to win matches."
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: full on off again, and Mashrafe covers his off stump before defending to the leg side
items.postText: Tamim Kabir: "What's the update of Tamim" -- he is out of the Asia Cup with a fractured left-wrist
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: goes short again! Lands on off, and Mashrafe's happy to duck under the ball
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: full outside off, and Mashrafe manages to get under this delivery. Swings through the ball's line, and smacks this into the long-on boundary
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mashrafe Mortaza, FOUR runs

items.text: overpitched outside off, and Mushfiqur can't connect with the full toss. He misses, and the keeper's pads ensure it doesn't go away for byes
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on off again, and he drives square to cover point. Can't beat the infield
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, and tapped away to the leg side. Stopped by the bowler
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
